flags.title: Unsatisfactory Images
flags.text: This project guide has low-quality images. Pictures need to be either re-edited or re-taken.

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: This mod lets you pull the trigger with out the magazine in the gun.
guide.introduction_rendered: This mod lets you pull the trigger with out the magazine in the gun.

lines.text: What you will need: different sized phillips-head screwdrivers
lines.text_raw: What you will need: different sized phillips-head screwdrivers

lines.text: open up the gun and you will see a yellow piece. take out the screws in the yellow piece so you can remove it. under the yellow piece there are 2 more pieces you need to remove. one has a spring and theother has a wheel on it. take those out and put every thing back together. enjoy your newly modded  magstrike as-10
lines.text_raw: open up the gun and you will see a yellow piece. take out the screws in the yellow piece so you can remove it. under the yellow piece there are 2 more pieces you need to remove. one has a spring and theother has a wheel on it. take those out and put every thing back together. enjoy your newly modded  magstrike as-10

guide.summary: This mod lets you pull the trigger with out the magazine in the gun.
guide.title: Magstrike Safety Removal
